DOC.brief_summary: An estimate two-thirds three- quarter woman experience gestational weight gain outside IOM 's 2009 recommendation : 40-60 % woman experience excessive gain 15-30 % inadequate gain . Not gain adequate weight gain strongly associate several maternal fetal complications..
DOC.brief_title: Physical Exercise Controls Gestational Weight Gain
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study assess role supervise exercise programme control maternal gestational weight gain consequence .
DOC.criteria: Being healthy able exercise follow American College Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) guideline Being able communicate spanish Obstetrician complication Being interested study 18 week Not regular physical exercise program Younger 18 year old
